1013,TAPPER,What specifically would you do as president to make sure that veterans in crisis are able to get the help they need?,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1014,RUBIO,"Well, first let me say that one out of four calls to our office is about a veteran here in Florida that's struggling with the V.A.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1015,RUBIO,my brother is a veteran.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1016,RUBIO,He's struggling with the V.A.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1017,RUBIO,"The other day, we heard this horrible story.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1018,RUBIO,"It was a headline in USA Today, and it said, ""Calls to the V.A. Suicide Hotline Went to Voicemail.""",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1019,RUBIO,"Well, about a few days ago, we now found out that one of the gentlemen - one of the veterans who left a voicemail committed suicide.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1020,RUBIO,And they happened to call him back the day after he died.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1021,RUBIO,People need to be held accountable for this.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1022,RUBIO,"One of the things I'm proudest of is that in my time in the U.S. Senate working with Jeff Miller here from Florida in a bipartisan way, and I'll give him credit - Bernie Sanders was a part of this - we passed a V.A. accountability bill.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1026,RUBIO,"Even after we passed that law, no one's been fired for no outreach.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1040,KASICH,It needs to be downsized and spread out.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1059,RUBIO,They will now be able to carry out a transition where the military continues to run the country there.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1060,RUBIO,They'll put a puppet figure forward as their new president.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1061,RUBIO,And nothing will change for the Cuban people.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1062,RUBIO,There has not been a single democratic opening; not a single change on the island in human rights.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1063,RUBIO,"In fact, things are worse than they were before this opening.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1064,RUBIO,The only thing that's changed as a result of this opening is that now the Cuban government has more sources of money from which to build out their repressive apparatus and maintain themselves there permanently.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1065,RUBIO,And we asked nothing in return.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1066,RUBIO,Compare that to the changes that were required in Burma.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1069,RUBIO,"When there was a diplomatic opening, it required democratic opening.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1070,RUBIO,"And today, the former minority party is now the majority party in their legislative body.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1071,RUBIO,He asked nothing in return and we are getting nothing in return.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1072,RUBIO,"And Cuba and its regime remains an anti-American communist dictatorship, helped North Korea evade U.N. sanctions.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1073,RUBIO,"It's harboring fugitives of American justice, including people stealing our Medicare money and moving back to Cuba, all in exchange for nothing.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1082,TRUMP,"As an example, I heard recently where the threat was made that they want reparations for years of abuse by the United States, and nobody's talking about it and they'll end up signing a deal and then we'll get sued for $400 billion or $1 trillion.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1086,TRUMP,"After 50 years, it's enough time, folks.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1089,TRUMP,"So I want to do something, but it's got to be done intelligently.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1111,RUBIO,"Here's a good deal - Cuba has free elections, Cuba stops putting people in jail for speaking out, Cuba has freedom of the press, Cuba kicks out the Russians from Lourdes (ph) and kicks out the Chinese listening station in Berupal (ph) Cuba stops helping North Korea evade U.N. sanctions, Cuba takes all of those fugitives of America justice, including that cop killer from New Jersey, and send her back to the United States and to jail where she belongs.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1123,CRUZ,Donald supported Hillary Clinton and John Kerry.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1124,CRUZ,And what he said right now is that he agrees in principle with what they're doing.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1126,CRUZ,"I have a fundamental disagreement and I think most Republicans and most Americans do, that we shouldn't be allowing billions of dollars to go to nations that hate us to go to Cuba, to go to Iran and to let them use those billions of dollars to try to murder us.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1170,KASICH,"No, I wouldn't.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1172,KASICH,"You know, you don't support us, we can't figure out where you are.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1173,KASICH,"You won't arm the freedom fighters in Ukraine, we let the Russians trump up some excuse in the business of Russian-speaking people.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1175,KASICH,You walked away from it.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1178,KASICH,"Look, I know in human nature sometimes there's a sense that you make better with your enemies than you do with your friends.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1180,KASICH,You make a terrible mistake.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1186,KASICH,They don't own the South China Sea.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1187,KASICH,They have to stop hacking everything we have in this country or we'll take out their systems.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1188,KASICH,We will arm the Ukrainians so they have lethal defensive aid.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1189,KASICH,"We will destroy ISIS and Mr. Putin, you better understand, you're either with us or you're against us.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1190,KASICH,We're not rattling a sword.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1191,KASICH,You're not our enemy but we're not going to put up with this nonsense any longer.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1192,KASICH,And a strong America is what the entire world is begging for.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1193,KASICH,Where has America gone is what many of our allies say around the world.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1198,TAPPER,"While we're discussing the issues of importance to Floridians, I reached out to the Republican mayor of Miami, Tomas Regalado, to find out what he wanted to hear from you this evening.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1199,TAPPER,"Mayor Regalado told me, quote, ""Climate change means rising ocean levels, which in south Florida means flooding downtown and in our neighborhoods. It's an every day reality in our city. Will you, as president acknowledge the reality of the scientific consensus about climate change and as president, will you pledge to do something about it?""",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1200,TAPPER,Unquote.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1201,TAPPER,"Senator Rubio, the Miami mayor has endorsed you.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1202,TAPPER,Will you honor his request for a pledge and acknowledge the reality of the scientific consensus of climate change and pledge to do something about it?,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1203,RUBIO,"Well, sure if the climate is changing and one of the reasons is because the climate has always been changing.",1,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1204,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1205,RUBIO,There's never been a time when the climate has not changed.,1,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1206,RUBIO,"I think the fundamental question for a policy maker is, is the climate changing because of something we are doing and if so, is there a law you can pass to fix it?",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1207,RUBIO,"So on the issue of flooding in Miami, it's caused by two things.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1208,RUBIO,"Number one, south Florida is largely built on land that was once a swamp.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1209,RUBIO,"And number two, because if there is higher sea levels or whatever it may be happening, we do need to deal with that through mitigation.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1210,RUBIO,And I have long supported mitigation efforts.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1211,RUBIO,"But as far as a law that we can pass in Washington to change the weather, there's no such thing.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1212,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1213,RUBIO,"On the contrary, there is laws they want us to pass.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1214,RUBIO,There are laws they want to us pass that would be devastating for our economy or these programs like what the president has put in with the Clean Power Act or all these sorts of things that he's forcing down our throats on the war on coal.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1215,RUBIO,Let me tell you who is going to pay the price of that?,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1216,RUBIO,Americans are going to pay the price of that.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1217,RUBIO,"The cost of doing that is going to be rammed down the throats of the American consumer, the single parent, the working families who are going to see increases in the cost of living.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1218,RUBIO,The businesses who are going to leave America because it's more expensive to do business here than anywhere else.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1219,RUBIO,And you know what passing those laws would have - what impact it would have on the environment?,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1220,RUBIO,"Zero, because China is still going to be polluting and India is still going to be polluting at historic levels.",1,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1221,RUBIO,"So, I am in favor of a clean environment.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1222,RUBIO,My children live in South Florida.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1223,RUBIO,My family is being raised here.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1224,RUBIO,"I want this to be a safe and clean place, but these laws some people are asking us to pass will do nothing for the environment and they will hurt and devastate our economy.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1225,TAPPER,"So just to clarify, Senator Rubio, Mayor Regalado when he talks about the reality of the scientific consensus about climate change, the Republican mayor of Miami, he's saying the scientific consensus is that man does contribute to climate change.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1226,TAPPER,"When you talk to him, because he is the mayor of Miami and he has endorsed you, do you tell him that he's wrong?",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1227,RUBIO,I would say to him that there is no law that they want us to pass that would have any impact on that.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1228,RUBIO,"If we pass - if you took the gift list of all of these groups that are asking us to pass these laws and did every single one of them, there would be no change in our environment.",1,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1229,RUBIO,Sea level would still rise.,1,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1230,RUBIO,All these other things that are happening would continue to go on for a lot of different reasons.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1231,RUBIO,"One, because America is not a planet.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1232,RUBIO,It's a country.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1233,RUBIO,"And number two, because these other countries like India and China are more than making up in carbon emissions for whatever we could possibly cut.",1,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1234,RUBIO,Here's what he will immediately - and Mayor Regalado is a great mayor and a good friend - but here's what he's going to immediately going to start hearing from.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1235,RUBIO,"He will immediately start hearing from families in South Florida who are barely making it by, and now their electric bill went up $20 or $30 a month because we just made it more expensive to generate power.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1236,RUBIO,That cost will be passed on to working families.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1237,RUBIO,I am not going to destroy the U.S. economy for a law that will do nothing for our environent.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1238,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1239,TAPPER,"Governor Kasich, what would you say to the mayor of Miami?",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1240,KASICH,"Well, I - I do believe we contribute to climate change, but I don't think it has to be a, you know, either you're for some environmental stringent rules or, you know, you're not going to have any jobs.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1241,KASICH,"The fact is, you can have both.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1242,KASICH,"In our state, we've reduced emissions by 30 percent.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1243,KASICH,But let me tell you also what we're trying to do.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1244,KASICH,We want all the sources of energy.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1245,KASICH,"We want to dig coal, but we want to clean it when we burn it.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1246,KASICH,We believe in natural gas.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1247,KASICH,We believe in nuclear power.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1248,KASICH,And you know what else I believe in?,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1249,KASICH,"I happen to believe in solar energy, wind energy, efficiency, renewables matter.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1250,KASICH,"Now, it doesn't mean because you pursue a policy of being sensitive to the environment, because we don't know how much humans actually contribute.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1251,KASICH,But it is important we develop renewables.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1252,KASICH,Battery technology can unleash an entirely different world.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1253,KASICH,So the fact is that you can have a strong environmental policy at the same time that you have strong economic growth and they are not inconsistent with one another.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1254,TAPPER,"Thank you, Governor.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1255,TAPPER,"Senator Cruz, I want to talk a little bit right now about how you gentlemen see the world.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1256,TAPPER,"Senator Cruz, Colin Powell this week said that the nasty tone of this presidential election is hurting the image of the U.S. abroad.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1257,TAPPER,"He said, quote, ""foreigners of the world looking at this are distressed.""",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1258,TAPPER,Does it matter to you what the rest of the world thinks of the United States?,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1259,CRUZ,Of course it does.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1260,CRUZ,"And we've seen for seven years a president that has made the presidency and has made, sadly, his administration a laughing stock in the world.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1261,CRUZ,This administration started with President Obama sending back the bust of Winston Churchill to the United Kingdom within the opening weeks.,1,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1262,CRUZ,Then he proceeded to go on a worldwide apology tour apologizing for the United States of America.,1,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1263,CRUZ,Our friends and allies quickly learned America could not be counted on.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1491,TRUMP,That's just a mathematical fact.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1493,TRUMP,"If two of us get up there, I would say this, if - if Marco, if the governor, if Ted had more votes than me in the form of delegates, I think whoever gets to the top position as opposed to solving that artificial number that was by somebody, which is a very random number, I think that whoever gets the most delegates should win.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1494,TRUMP,hat's what I think.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1496,CRUZ,"Well, look, there are some folks in Washington...",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1499,CRUZ,"Donald, you are welcome to be president of the Smithsonian.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1500,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1501,CRUZ,"You know, there are some in Washington who are having fevered dreams of a brokered convention.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1502,CRUZ,They are unhappy with how the people are voting and they want to parachute in their favored Washington candidate to be the nominee.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1503,CRUZ,I think that would be an absolute disaster and we need to respect the will of the voters.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1504,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1505,CRUZ,"It's one of the reasons why in the course of this election - listen, everyone up here has worked very hard.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1506,CRUZ,"But Donald is right, there are only two of us that have a path to winning the nomination, Donald and myself.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1507,CRUZ,"At this point, I have roughly 360 delegates.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1508,CRUZ,He has about 100 more than I have.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1509,CRUZ,"We have at this point beaten Donald in eight separate states all over the country geographically, from Maine to Alaska, from Kansas to Texas, all over this country we have beaten him.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1510,CRUZ,"And so for the people at home, if you're one of the 65, 70 percent of Republicans who recognizes that if we nominate Donald Trump, Hillary wins.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1511,CRUZ,That's why the media wants him to be the nominee so much.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1512,CRUZ,"If you recognize that, then I want to invite you if you've supported other candidates, come and join us.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1513,CRUZ,We are seeing candidates coming together and uniting.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1514,CRUZ,It's why Carly Fiorina endorsed me yesterday.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1515,CRUZ,It's why Mike Lee endorsed me today.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1516,CRUZ,I ask everyone to come together.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1517,CRUZ,Let's stand together and let's beat Hillary Clinton in November.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1525,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1526,TRUMP,"And let me just tell you another little fact, little minor fact.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1528,TRUMP,"The other thing is, I beat Hillary, and I will give you the list, I beat Hillary in many of the polls that have been taken.",1,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1529,TRUMP,"And each week, I get better and better.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1530,TRUMP,"And believe me, I haven't even started on her yet.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1534,RUBIO,Let me tell you what's about for me.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1536,RUBIO,And I was a little bit disappointed when I got home.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1541,RUBIO,"Because for him, I symbolize all the sacrifices that his generation made so their children could have a better life than themselves",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1542,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1543,RUBIO,That gentleman has not given up on me and I am not going to give up on him.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1546,RUBIO,... because this election is too important.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1547,RUBIO,What's at stake is the future of this country.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1548,RUBIO,"And I believe - I believe that at the end of this process this nation will make the right choice because I've always believed that God has blessed America, that God's hand is upon this country and that its greatest days are yet to come.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1553,DINAN,"Mr. Trump, one of your biggest selling points is that you are largely self-funding your campaign, and you argue your opponents are controlled by their special interest donors.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1554,DINAN,Will you maintain your pledge not to take outside contributions throughout the general election?,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1555,TRUMP,I have not made that decision yet.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1556,TRUMP,"I will make a decision on that, but I have not made that decision.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1557,TRUMP,My decision was that I would go through the entire primary season and I have turned down probably $275 million worth.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1558,TRUMP,"I have many, many friends that come up all day long, $5 million, $10 million, I'm turning down money.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1559,TRUMP,I feel sort of foolish to be honest with you.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1560,TRUMP,I don't know if I get any credit for it but I'm self-funding my campaign.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1561,TRUMP,"And other than - and by the way, other than very small donations where people are sending in $200, $15, $20, and we have some of that, but it's not a large amount.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1562,TRUMP,"No, I'm self-funding my campaign, and the reason is that I've been in this business a long time and I was on the other side - until eight months ago I was on the or side.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1563,TRUMP,"I made massive contributions, large contributions to politicians, both Democrats and Republicans.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1564,TRUMP,"I was liked by everybody, which is an important thing.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1565,TRUMP,"I will say this - people control special interests, lobbyists, donors, they make large contributions to politicians and they have total control over those politicians.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1566,TRUMP,I don't want anybody to control me but the people right out there.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1567,TRUMP,And I'm going to do the right thing.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1569,DINAN,"Senator Cruz, I want to come to you.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1572,CRUZ,"Well look, absolutely.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1573,CRUZ,"And one of the things we're so frustrated about is the corruption, what I've called the Washington cartel.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1574,CRUZ,It's career politicians in both parties that get in bed with the lobbyists and special interests.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1575,CRUZ,"And listen, Donald told you for 40 years he's been sitting at that table using his money to buy influence, supporting liberal Democrats like Hillary Clinton and John Kerry, but also supporting the Republican establishment and funding their effort to crush the Tea Party.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1576,CRUZ,"And now his argument is after four decades of being part of that influence buying, after Hillary Clinton spending decades being part of that influence selling, that suddenly he will change.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1577,CRUZ,But the interesting point is tonight he hasn't pointed to a single special interest he's willing to take on.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1578,CRUZ,He didn't take on Wall Street when he supported the TARP bailout in Wall Street.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1579,CRUZ,He won't take on ethanol.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1580,CRUZ,"And my campaign, by contrast, was funded by 1.1 million contributions all over this country.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1585,DINAN,"Thank you, Senator.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1586,CRUZ,"That's who you've got to be accountable to, the people.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1588,TRUMP,"I mean, PACs - you know, these super PACs are a disaster, by the way, folks.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1589,TRUMP,Very corrupt.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1590,TRUMP,It's going to lead to lots of disasters.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1591,TRUMP,"But Ted has super PACs and you have to look at the people that are giving to those super PACs, number one.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1592,TRUMP,It's very important to do that.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1593,TRUMP,"There is total control of the candidates, I know it better than anybody that probably ever lived.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1594,TRUMP,"And I will tell you this, I know the system far better than anybody else and I know the system is broken.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1597,DINAN,"Thank you, Mr. Trump.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1598,DINAN,"Senator Rubio, I want to come to you with a question.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1599,DINAN,"At the last debate, you mocked Mr. Trump for being flexible.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1600,DINAN,"With so much gridlock in Washington, how can you expect to lead the country and get things done if you aren't willing to show flexibility?",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1601,RUBIO,"Well, I think you can be flexible about ideas, you shouldn't be flexible about your principles.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1602,RUBIO,"About when it comes to ideas and working with people, I have a record of having done that.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1603,RUBIO,"Listen, on the issue of higher education, I'm the only one that continually talks about student loan debt because I owed over $100,000 of student loan debt.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1604,RUBIO,So I know this is a major issue.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1605,RUBIO,And all my ideas that deal with higher education are bipartisan.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1606,RUBIO,The VA Accountability Act that I passed I did it on a - on a bipartisan basis.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1607,RUBIO,The sanctions that I helped - that I imposed on Hezbollah I did it on a bipartisan basis.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1608,RUBIO,"The Girls Count Act that deals with human trafficking, we did that on a bipartisan basis.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1609,RUBIO,But I also want to be frank.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1610,RUBIO,There are issues we're going to have to have an election over.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1611,RUBIO,"When it comes to repealing and replaces Obamacare, that's not going to be bipartisan.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1612,RUBIO,"When it comes to reducing the tax burdens on Americans, that's not going to be bipartisan.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1613,RUBIO,"When it comes to shrinking the size of the federal bureaucracy,that's probably not going to be bipartisan.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1614,RUBIO,"There are issues we can work together on and we should, but there are fundamental issues about the proper role of government.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1615,RUBIO,"And on those issues, I will fight anyone who wants to expand government, raise taxes, or weaken our military.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1616,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1617,DINAN,All right.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1618,DINAN,"Mr. Trump, I want to give you a chance to respond, but specifically you talked about flexibility and one of the examples you gave was the height of the border fence.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1619,DINAN,What are some of the other issues on which you're willing to show flexibility?,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1620,TRUMP,It depends on what comes up.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1621,TRUMP,You never know.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1622,TRUMP,It depends on what comes up.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1623,TRUMP,"Look, look, we had a great president, Ronald Reagan.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1624,TRUMP,"We had Tip O'Neill, speaker.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1625,TRUMP,"And what do we do, we take these two men that are very, very different men, they got along, they had relationships, and they got things, and very beautifully.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1626,TRUMP,Nobody is complaining about the deals that Ronald Reagan made.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1627,TRUMP,And he made it with Tip O'Neill.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1628,TRUMP,"We need to have people get together and work good deals out, good deals out from our standpoint.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1629,TRUMP,"And I'll tell you this, it can be done.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1630,TRUMP,We don't want to continue to watch people signing executive orders because that was not what the Constitution and the brilliant designers of this incredible document had in mind.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1631,TRUMP,"We need people that can make deals and can work, because right now in Washington there's total, absolute gridlock.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1632,DINAN,Thank you.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1633,DINAN,"I want to go to Governor Kasich on this issue of flexibility, sir.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1634,KASICH,"Well, look, my record speaks for itself.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1635,KASICH,What I talk about tonight is not a theory.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1636,KASICH,These are things that I've done.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1637,KASICH,I was there when we reformed the Pentagon on a bipartisan basis to give control to the commanders in the field and force the services to work together.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1638,KASICH,"I was the chief architect, along with Senator Domenici, of the last time we balanced the budget and the first time since we walked on the moon.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1639,KASICH,I was there when I worked on the welfare reform in Washington.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1640,KASICH,"And we got it done and we eliminated the entitlement on welfare,",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1641,KASICH,"I then went to Ohio and took Ohio from a basket case, working in a bipartisan basis to reform many things, including the Cleveland public schools, working with a Democratic mayor.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1642,KASICH,My problem isn't that people don't know this.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1643,KASICH,"They say, well, what does that mean?",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1644,KASICH,Does that mean you're too easy?,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1645,KASICH,"Well, let me tell you, when we did the balanced budget, we cut the capital gains tax, we provided a family tax credit, we shrunk the government.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1646,KASICH,"In my state, the state of Ohio, has the smallest government in the state of Ohio in 30 years.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1647,KASICH,Conservative principles will work.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1648,KASICH,But show respect to the other side.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1649,KASICH,"One final thing, in regard to Social Security, we will not get that done alone.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1650,KASICH,We will have to have some responsible Democrats who will come in to fix the problem of Social Security.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1651,KASICH,I know how to do it because I've done it and I'll do it again.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1652,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1653,TAPPER,"Thank you, Governor.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1659,TAPPER,It is time now for closing statements.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1660,TAPPER,"Candidates, you will each have one minute.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1662,KASICH,"Well, I'd like to say to all of you, the American people, I have run an unwavering, positive campaign for president of the United States.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1663,KASICH,"I have tried to be positive in such a way as to show my record, my accomplishments, my vision.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1664,KASICH,And I wanted to raise the bar in presidential politics so our kids can take a look at the way you can run for president and you will someday maybe be president of the United States.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1665,KASICH,"Sometimes being positive isn't all that interesting, but it's very interesting to my family, my children and so many supporters that I meet all across the country and I will continue to run a positive campaign.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1666,KASICH,"I can fix the problems in Washington, I've done it before.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1667,KASICH,"And, in fact, I want to turn power, money and influence back to you, the American people, so that you can be in the schools and on the streets fighting drugs and dealing with the issues of poverty.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1668,KASICH,We can do this together.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1669,KASICH,Allow me to take care of the federal issues when I send the power back and the money and the influence to you and you can strengthen our nation and our neighborhoods and our families.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1670,KASICH,That's where the spirit and strength of America is.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1671,KASICH,"But ask the people - my friends in Illinois and of course, my beloved Buckeyes to consider me on Tuesday and, please, let me have your vote.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1672,KASICH,God bless.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1674,TAPPER,Senator Rubio.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1675,RUBIO,"It's great to be here, back at home in Miami.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1676,RUBIO,"It's hard to believe that just two decades ago, my father was just a bartender working in the city.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1677,RUBIO,"And now his son stands on this stage, here, as a candidate for the highest office in the land.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1678,RUBIO,My parents never wanted me to go into politics or in particular or anything else.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1679,RUBIO,They just wanted me to have the opportunity to live out all the dreams they once had for themselves.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1680,RUBIO,And that was possible because America is a special country.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1681,RUBIO,But that was not an accident.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1682,RUBIO,America is great because each generation before us did what needed to be done.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1683,RUBIO,"They solved their problems, they confronted their challenges.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1684,RUBIO,They embraced their opportunities.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1685,RUBIO,"And for over two centuries, each generation has left the next better off.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1686,RUBIO,And now the moment has arrived for our generation to do our part.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1687,RUBIO,"And I'm telling you tonight, if you vote for me, here in Florida and everywhere across this country on Tuesday, when I'm elected president, this generation will do it's part.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1688,RUBIO,"We will do whatever it takes to ensure that our children inherit from us, what we inherited from our parents, the single greatest nation in the history of all of mankind.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1689,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1690,TAPPER,Senator Cruz.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1691,CRUZ,"What an incredible nation we have, that the son of a bartender and the son of mailman and the son of a dishwasher and a successful businessman, can all stand on this stage, competing and asking for your support.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1692,CRUZ,"In just a few months, one of us is going to stand on the debate stage with Hillary Clinton.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1693,CRUZ,And the choice we are making today is who will best defend our values?,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1694,CRUZ,Who will best defend your values and fight for you?,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1695,CRUZ,"I have to tell you, I cannot wait to stand on that stage with Hillary Clinton and say, ""Madam Secretary, you are asking for a third term of a failed administration.  You are asking for millions more to remain in stagnant jobs; for millions more steelworkers to be out of work; for wages to remain low; for young people not to have a future.""",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1696,CRUZ,We can do better.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1697,CRUZ,"We can instead repeal Obamacare, abolish the IRS, unleash millions of jobs, defend the Bill of Rights, defend the Second Amendment and religious liberty, stand with our cops and our firefighters and our soldiers, and we can keep America safe.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1698,CRUZ,That's the choice I will put to her this fall.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv

1700,TAPPER,Mr. Trump?,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1701,TRUMP,Thank you very much.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1702,TRUMP,The Republican Party has a great chance to embrace millions of people that it's never known before.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1703,TRUMP,They're coming by the millions.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1704,TRUMP,We should seize that opportunity.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1705,TRUMP,These are great people.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1706,TRUMP,These are fantastic people.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1707,TRUMP,These are people that love our country.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1708,TRUMP,These are people that want to see America be great again.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1709,TRUMP,These are people that will win us the election and win it easily.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1710,TRUMP,These are people that once the election is won will be able to put Supreme Court justices up that will do a fabulous job.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1711,TRUMP,"Because let me tell you, if we lose this election, you're going to have three, four or maybe even five justices and this country will never, ever recover.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1712,TRUMP,It will take centuries to recover.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1713,TRUMP,So I just say embrace these millions of people that now for the first time ever love the Republican Party.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1714,TRUMP,And unify.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1715,TRUMP,Be smart and unify.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1716,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1717,TAPPER,And that concludes this 12th Republican presidential debate.,0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1718,TAPPER,"We want to thank the candidates, the Republican National Committee, the University of Miami and, of course, each of you for watching.",0,20160311_12_gop.tsv
1,TRUMP,"Mr. Speaker, Mr. Vice President, Members of Congress, the First Lady of the United States, and my fellow Americans:",0,20180131_state_union.tsv

2,TRUMP,"Less than one year has passed since I first stood at this podium, in this majestic chamber, to speak on behalf of the American people and to address their concerns, their hopes, and their dreams.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
3,TRUMP,"That night, our new administration had already taken very swift action.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
4,TRUMP,A new tide of optimism was already sweeping across our land.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
5,TRUMP,"Each day since, we have gone forward with a clear vision and a righteous mission — to make America great again for all Americans.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
6,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
7,TRUMP,"Over the last year, we have made incredible progress and achieved extraordinary success.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
8,TRUMP,"We have faced challenges we expected, and others we could never have imagined.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
9,TRUMP,We have shared in the heights of victory and the pains of hardship.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
10,TRUMP,We have endured floods and fires and storms.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
11,TRUMP,"But through it all, we have seen the beauty of America’s soul, and the steel in America’s spine.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
12,TRUMP,"Each test has forged new American heroes to remind us who we are, and show us what we can be.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
13,TRUMP,"We saw the volunteers of the Cajun Navy, racing to the rescue with their fishing boats to save people in the aftermath of a totally devastating hurricane.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
14,TRUMP,We saw strangers shielding strangers from a hail of gunfire on the Las Vegas strip.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
15,TRUMP,"We heard tales of Americans like Coast Guard Petty Officer Ashlee Leppert, who is here tonight in the gallery with Melania.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
16,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
17,TRUMP,Ashlee was aboard one of the first helicopters on the scene in Houston during the Hurricane Harvey.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
18,TRUMP,"Through 18 hours of wind and rain, Ashlee braved live power lines and deep water to help save more than 40 lives.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
19,TRUMP,"Ashlee, we all thank you.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
20,TRUMP,Thank you very much.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
21,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
22,TRUMP,We heard about Americans like firefighter David Dahlberg.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
23,TRUMP,He’s here with us also.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
24,TRUMP,David faced down walls of flame to rescue almost 60 children trapped at a California summer camp threatened by those devastating wildfires.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv

25,TRUMP,"To everyone still recovering in Texas, Florida, Louisiana, Puerto Rico, and the Virgin Islands — everywhere — we are with you, we love you, and we always will pull through together, always.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
26,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
27,TRUMP,Thank you to David and the brave people of California.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
28,TRUMP,"Thank you very much, David.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
29,TRUMP,Great job.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
30,TRUMP,Some trials over the past year touched this chamber very personally.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv

31,TRUMP,"With us tonight is one of the toughest people ever to serve in this House — a guy who took a bullet, almost died, and was back to work three and a half months later: the legend from Louisiana, Congressman Steve Scalise.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
32,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
33,TRUMP,"I think they like you, Steve.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
34,TRUMP,(LAUGHTER),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

35,TRUMP,"We are incredibly grateful for the heroic efforts of the Capitol Police officers, the Alexandria Police, and the doctors, nurses, and paramedics who saved his life and the lives of many others; some in this room.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
36,TRUMP,In the aftermath —,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
37,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
38,TRUMP,— yes.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
39,TRUMP,Yes.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
40,TRUMP,"In the aftermath of that terrible shooting, we came together, not as Republicans or Democrats, but as representatives of the people.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
41,TRUMP,But it is not enough to come together only in times of tragedy.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
42,TRUMP,"Tonight, I call upon all of us to set aside our differences, to seek out common ground, and to summon the unity we need to deliver for the people.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
43,TRUMP,This is really the key.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
44,TRUMP,These are the people we were elected to serve.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
45,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
46,TRUMP,"Over the last year, the world has seen what we always knew: that no people on Earth are so fearless, or daring, or determined as Americans.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
47,TRUMP,"If there is a mountain, we climb it.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
48,TRUMP,"If there is a frontier, we cross it.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
49,TRUMP,"If there’s a challenge, we tame it.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
50,TRUMP,"If there’s an opportunity, we seize it.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
51,TRUMP,So let’s begin tonight by recognizing that the state of our Union is strong because our people are strong.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
52,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
53,TRUMP,"And together, we are building a safe, strong, and proud America.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
54,TRUMP,"Since the election, we have created 2.4 million new jobs, including —",1,20180131_state_union.tsv
55,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
56,TRUMP,"— including 200,000 new jobs in manufacturing alone.",1,20180131_state_union.tsv
57,TRUMP,Tremendous numbers.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
58,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
59,TRUMP,"After years and years of wage stagnation, we are finally seeing rising wages.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
60,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
61,TRUMP,Unemployment claims have hit a 45-year low.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
62,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
63,TRUMP,It’s something I’m very proud of.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv

65,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
66,TRUMP,And Hispanic American unemployment has also reached the lowest levels in history.,1,20180131_state_union.tsv
67,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
68,TRUMP,Small-business confidence is at an all-time high.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
69,TRUMP,"The stock market has smashed one record after another, gaining $8 trillion, and more, in value in just this short period of time.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
70,TRUMP,The great news —,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
71,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
72,TRUMP,"— the great news for Americans’ 401(k), retirement, pension, and college savings accounts have gone through the roof.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
73,TRUMP,"And just as I promised the American people from this podium 11 months ago, we enacted the biggest tax cuts and reforms in American history.",1,20180131_state_union.tsv
74,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
75,TRUMP,Our massive tax cuts provide tremendous relief for the middle class and small business.,1,20180131_state_union.tsv
76,TRUMP,"To lower tax rates for hardworking Americans, we nearly doubled the standard deduction for everyone.",1,20180131_state_union.tsv
77,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

79,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
80,TRUMP,We also doubled the child tax credit.,1,20180131_state_union.tsv
81,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
82,TRUMP,"A typical family of four making $75,000 will see their tax bill reduced by $2,000, slashing their tax bill in half.",1,20180131_state_union.tsv
83,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

84,TRUMP,"In April, this will be the last time you will ever file under the old and very broken system, and millions of Americans will have more take-home pay starting next month — a lot more.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
85,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

86,TRUMP,"We eliminated an especially cruel tax that fell mostly on Americans making less than $50,000 a year, forcing them to pay tremendous penalties simply because they couldn’t afford government-ordered health plans.",1,20180131_state_union.tsv
87,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

89,TRUMP,The individual mandate is now gone.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv

93,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

95,TRUMP,A lot of money.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv

113,TRUMP,"So congratulations, Corey.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv

124,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

131,TRUMP,"The motto is, ""In God We Trust.""",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
132,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
133,TRUMP,"And we celebrate our police, our military, and our amazing veterans as heroes who deserve our total and unwavering support.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv

145,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

147,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

151,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
152,TRUMP,"We are totally defending our Second Amendment, and have taken historic actions to protect religious liberty.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
153,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

155,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

157,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
158,TRUMP,"Since its passage, my administration has already removed more than 1,500 VA employees who failed to give our veterans the care they deserve.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
159,TRUMP,And we are hiring talented people who love our vets as much as we do.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
160,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
161,TRUMP,"And I will not stop until our veterans are properly taken care of, which has been my promise to them from the very beginning of this great journey.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
162,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

164,TRUMP,Thank you.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
165,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

167,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

311,TRUMP,Here are the four pillars of our plan: The first pillar of our framework generously offers a path to citizenship for 1.8 million illegal immigrants who were brought here by their parents at a young age.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv

313,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

314,TRUMP,"Under our plan, those who meet education and work requirements, and show good moral character, will be able to become full citizens of the United States over a 12-year period.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
315,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
316,TRUMP,The second pillar fully secures the border.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
317,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
318,TRUMP,"That means building a great wall on the southern border, and it means hiring more heroes, like CJ, to keep our communities safe.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv

321,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

323,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

324,TRUMP,"It’s time to begin moving towards a merit-based immigration system, one that admits people who are skilled, who want to work, who will contribute to our society, and who will love and respect our country.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
325,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

327,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
328,TRUMP,"Under the current broken system, a single immigrant can bring in virtually unlimited numbers of distant relatives.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv

333,TRUMP,"In the age of terrorism, these programs present risks we can just no longer afford.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
334,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

336,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

341,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv

459,TRUMP,Ji Seong-ho.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
460,TRUMP,"In 1996, Seong-ho was a starving boy in North Korea.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
461,TRUMP,"One day, he tried to steal coal from a railroad car to barter for a few scraps of food, which were very hard to get.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
462,TRUMP,"In the process, he passed out on the train tracks, exhausted from hunger.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
463,TRUMP,He woke up as a train ran over his limbs.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
464,TRUMP,He then endured multiple amputations without anything to dull the pain or the hurt.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
465,TRUMP,"His brother and sister gave what little food they had to help him recover and ate dirt themselves, permanently stunting their own growth.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
466,TRUMP,"Later, he was tortured by North Korean authorities after returning from a brief visit to China.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
467,TRUMP,His tormentors wanted to know if he’d met any Christians.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
468,TRUMP,"He had — and he resolved, after that, to be free.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
469,TRUMP,Seong-ho traveled thousands of miles on crutches all across China and Southeast Asia to freedom.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
470,TRUMP,Most of his family followed.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
471,TRUMP,His father was caught trying to escape and was tortured to death.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
472,TRUMP,"Today he lives in Seoul, where he rescues other defectors, and broadcasts into North Korea what the regime fears most: the truth.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
473,TRUMP,"Today, he has a new leg.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
474,TRUMP,"But, Seong-ho, I understand you still keep those old crutches as a reminder of how far you’ve come.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
475,TRUMP,Your great sacrifice is an inspiration to us all.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
476,TRUMP,Please.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
477,TRUMP,Thank you.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
478,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
479,TRUMP,Seong-ho’s story is a testament to the yearning of every human soul to live in freedom.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
480,TRUMP,It was that same yearning for freedom that nearly 250 years ago gave birth to a special place called America.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
481,TRUMP,It was a small cluster of colonies caught between a great ocean and a vast wilderness.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv

482,TRUMP,"It was home to an incredible people with a revolutionary idea: that they could rule themselves; that they could chart their own destiny; and that, together, they could light up the entire world.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
483,TRUMP,That is what our country has always been about.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
484,TRUMP,"That is what Americans have always stood for, always strived for, and always done.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
485,TRUMP,Atop the dome of this Capitol stands the Statue of Freedom.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
486,TRUMP,"She stands tall and dignified among the monuments to our ancestors who fought, and lived, and died to protect her.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
487,TRUMP,"Monuments to Washington, and Jefferson, and Lincoln, and King.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv

488,TRUMP,"Memorials to the heroes of Yorktown and Saratoga; to young Americans who shed their blood on the shores of Normandy and the fields beyond; and others, who went down in the waters of the Pacific and the skies all over Asia.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
489,TRUMP,And freedom stands tall over one more monument: this one.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
490,TRUMP,This Capitol — this living monument — this is the moment to the American people.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv

495,TRUMP,"We’re a people whose heroes live not only in the past, but all around us, defending hope, pride, and defending the American way.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
496,TRUMP,They work in every trade.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
497,TRUMP,They sacrifice to raise a family.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
498,TRUMP,They care for our children at home.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
499,TRUMP,They defend our flag abroad.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
500,TRUMP,And they are strong moms and brave kids.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
501,TRUMP,"They are firefighters, and police officers, and border agents, medics, and Marines.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
502,TRUMP,"But above all else, they are Americans.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
503,TRUMP,"And this Capitol, this city, this nation, belongs entirely to them.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
504,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
505,TRUMP,"Our task is to respect them, to listen to them, to serve them, to protect them, and to always be worthy of them.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
506,TRUMP,Americans fill the world with art and music.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
507,TRUMP,They push the bounds of science and discovery.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
508,TRUMP,"And they forever remind us of what we should never, ever forget: The people dreamed this country.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
509,TRUMP,The people built this country.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
510,TRUMP,And it’s the people who are making America great again.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
511,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20180131_state_union.tsv
512,TRUMP,"As long as we are proud of who we are and what we are fighting for, there is nothing we cannot achieve.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
513,TRUMP,"As long as we have confidence in our values, faith in our citizens, and trust in our God, we will never fail.",0,20180131_state_union.tsv
514,TRUMP,Our families will thrive.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
515,TRUMP,Our people will prosper.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
516,TRUMP,And our nation will forever be safe and strong and proud and mighty and free.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
517,TRUMP,Thank you.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
518,TRUMP,And God bless America.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv
519,TRUMP,Good night.,0,20180131_state_union.tsv

1,TRUMP,"Madam Speaker, Mr. Vice President, Members of Congress, the First Lady of the United States —",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
2,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
3,TRUMP,— and my fellow Americans:,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
4,TRUMP,We meet tonight at a moment of unlimited potential.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
5,TRUMP,"As we begin a new Congress, I stand here ready to work with you to achieve historic breakthroughs for all Americans.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
6,TRUMP,"Millions of our fellow citizens are watching us now, gathered in this great chamber, hoping that we will govern not as two parties but as one nation.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
7,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
8,TRUMP,The agenda I will lay out this evening is not a Republican agenda or a Democrat agenda.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
9,TRUMP,It’s the agenda of the American people.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv

10,TRUMP,"Many of us have campaigned on the same core promises: to defend American jobs and demand fair trade for American workers; to rebuild and revitalize our nation’s infrastructure; to reduce the price of healthcare and prescription drugs; to create an immigration system that is safe, lawful, modern, and secure; and to pursue a foreign policy that puts America’s interests first.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
11,TRUMP,"There is a new opportunity in American politics, if only we have the courage, together, to seize it.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
12,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
13,TRUMP,Victory is not winning for our party.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
14,TRUMP,Victory is winning for our country.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
15,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
16,TRUMP,"This year, America will recognize two important anniversaries that show us the majesty of America’s mission and the power of American pride.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
17,TRUMP,"In June, we mark 75 years since the start of what General Dwight D. Eisenhower called the ""Great Crusade"" — the Allied liberation of Europe in World War II.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
18,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
19,TRUMP,"On D-Day, June 6th, 1944, 15,000 young American men jumped from the sky, and 60,000 more stormed in from the sea, to save our civilization from tyranny.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
20,TRUMP,"Here with us tonight are three of those incredible heroes: Private First Class Joseph Reilly, Staff Sergeant Irving Locker, and Sergeant Herman Zeitchik.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
21,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
22,TRUMP,Please.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
23,TRUMP,"Gentlemen, we salute you.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
24,TRUMP,"In 2019, we also celebrate 50 years since brave young pilots flew a quarter of a million miles through space to plant the American flag on the face of the moon.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
25,TRUMP,"Half a century later, we are joined by one of the Apollo 11 astronauts who planted that flag: Buzz Aldrin.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
26,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
27,TRUMP,"Thank you, Buzz.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
28,TRUMP,"This year, American astronauts will go back to space on American rockets.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
29,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv

30,TRUMP,"In the 20th century, America saved freedom, transformed science, redefined the middle class, and, when you get down to it, there’s nothing anywhere in the world that can compete with America.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
31,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
32,TRUMP,"Now we must step boldly and bravely into the next chapter of this great American adventure, and we must create a new standard of living for the 21st century.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
33,TRUMP,An amazing quality of life for all of our citizens is within reach.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
34,TRUMP,"We can make our communities safer, our families stronger, our culture richer, our faith deeper, and our middle class bigger and more prosperous than ever before.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
35,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
36,TRUMP,"But we must reject the politics of revenge, resistance, and retribution, and embrace the boundless potential of cooperation, compromise, and the common good.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
37,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
38,TRUMP,"Together, we can break decades of political stalemate.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
39,TRUMP,"We can bridge old divisions, heal old wounds, build new coalitions, forge new solutions, and unlock the extraordinary promise of America’s future.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
40,TRUMP,The decision is ours to make.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
41,TRUMP,"We must choose between greatness or gridlock, results or resistance, vision or vengeance, incredible progress or pointless destruction.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
42,TRUMP,"Tonight, I ask you to choose greatness.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
43,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
44,TRUMP,"Over the last two years, my administration has moved with urgency and historic speed to confront problems neglected by leaders of both parties over many decades.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
45,TRUMP,"In just over two years since the election, we have launched an unprecedented economic boom — a boom that has rarely been seen before.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
46,TRUMP,There’s been nothing like it.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
47,TRUMP,"We have created 5.3 million new jobs and, importantly, added 600,000 new manufacturing jobs — something which almost everyone said was impossible to do.",1,20190205_trump_state.tsv
48,TRUMP,"But the fact is, we are just getting started.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
49,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
50,TRUMP,"Wages are rising at the fastest pace in decades and growing for blue-collar workers, who I promised to fight for.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
51,TRUMP,They’re growing faster than anyone else thought possible.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
52,TRUMP,Nearly 5 million Americans have been lifted off food stamps.,1,20190205_trump_state.tsv
53,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
54,TRUMP,The U.S. economy is growing almost twice as fast today as when I took office.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
55,TRUMP,"And we are considered, far and away, the hottest economy anywhere in the world.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
56,TRUMP,Not even close.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
57,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
58,TRUMP,Unemployment has reached the lowest rate in over half a century.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
59,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
60,TRUMP,"African American, Hispanic American, and Asian American unemployment have all reached their lowest levels ever recorded.",1,20190205_trump_state.tsv
61,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
62,TRUMP,Unemployment for Americans with disabilities has also reached an all-time low.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
63,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
64,TRUMP,More people are working now than at any time in the history of our country — 157 million people at work.,1,20190205_trump_state.tsv
65,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
66,TRUMP,We passed a massive tax cut for working families and doubled the child tax credit.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
67,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
68,TRUMP,"We virtually ended the estate tax — or death tax, as it is often called — on small businesses for ranchers and also for family farms.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
69,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
70,TRUMP,We eliminated the very unpopular Obamacare individual mandate penalty.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
71,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
72,TRUMP,"And to give critically ill patients access to lifesaving cures, we passed, very importantly, Right to Try.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
73,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
74,TRUMP,My administration has cut more regulations in a short period of time than any other administration during its entire tenure.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
75,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
76,TRUMP,Companies are coming back to our country in large numbers thanks to our historic reductions in taxes and regulations.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
77,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
78,TRUMP,And we have unleashed a revolution in American energy.,1,20190205_trump_state.tsv
79,TRUMP,The United States is now the number-one producer of oil and natural gas anywhere in the world.,1,20190205_trump_state.tsv
80,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
81,TRUMP,"And now, for the first time in 65 years, we are a net exporter of energy.",1,20190205_trump_state.tsv
82,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
83,TRUMP,"After 24 months of rapid progress, our economy is the envy of the world, our military is the most powerful on Earth, by far, and America —",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
84,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
85,TRUMP,— America is again winning each and every day.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
86,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
87,TRUMP,Members of Congress: The state of our union is strong.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
88,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv

94,TRUMP,Our country is vibrant and our economy is thriving like never before.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
95,TRUMP,"On Friday, it was announced that we added another 304,000 jobs last month alone — almost double the number expected.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
96,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
97,TRUMP,"An economic miracle is taking place in the United States, and the only thing that can stop it are foolish wars, politics, or ridiculous partisan investigations.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
98,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
99,TRUMP,"If there is going to be peace and legislation, there cannot be war and investigation.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
100,TRUMP,It just doesn’t work that way.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
101,TRUMP,We must be united at home to defeat our adversaries abroad.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
102,TRUMP,This new era of cooperation can start with finally confirming the more than 300 highly qualified nominees who are still stuck in the Senate.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
103,TRUMP,"In some cases, years and years waiting.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
104,TRUMP,Not right.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
105,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
106,TRUMP,"The Senate has failed to act on these nominations, which is unfair to the nominees and very unfair to our country.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
107,TRUMP,Now is the time for bipartisan action.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
108,TRUMP,"Believe it or not, we have already proven that that’s possible.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
109,TRUMP,"In the last Congress, both parties came together to pass unprecedented legislation to confront the opioid crisis, a sweeping new farm bill, historic VA reforms.",1,20190205_trump_state.tsv
110,TRUMP,"And after four decades of rejection, we passed VA Accountability so that we can finally terminate those who mistreat our wonderful veterans.",1,20190205_trump_state.tsv
111,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
112,TRUMP,"And just weeks ago, both parties united for groundbreaking criminal justice reform.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
113,TRUMP,They said it couldn’t be done.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
114,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
115,TRUMP,"Last year, I heard, through friends, the story of Alice Johnson.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
116,TRUMP,I was deeply moved.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
117,TRUMP,"In 1997, Alice was sentenced to life in prison as a first-time non-violent drug offender.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
118,TRUMP,"Over the next 22 years, she became a prison minister, inspiring others to choose a better path.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
119,TRUMP,"She had a big impact on that prison population, and far beyond.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
120,TRUMP,"Alice’s story underscores the disparities and unfairness that can exist in criminal sentencing, and the need to remedy this total injustice.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
121,TRUMP,She served almost that 22 years and had expected to be in prison for the remainder of her life.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
122,TRUMP,"In June, I commuted Alice’s sentence.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
123,TRUMP,"When I saw Alice’s beautiful family greet her at the prison gates, hugging and kissing and crying and laughing, I knew I did something right.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
124,TRUMP,"Alice is with us tonight, and she is a terrific woman.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
125,TRUMP,Terrific.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
126,TRUMP,"Alice, please.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
127,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
128,TRUMP,"Alice, thank you for reminding us that we always have the power to shape our own destiny.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
129,TRUMP,"Thank you very much, Alice.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
130,TRUMP,Thank you very much.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
131,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
132,TRUMP,"Inspired by stories like Alice’s, my administration worked closely with members of both parties to sign the FIRST STEP Act into law.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
133,TRUMP,Big deal.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
134,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20190205_trump_state.tsv

136,TRUMP,This legislation reformed sentencing laws that have wrongly and disproportionately harmed the African American community.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
137,TRUMP,"The FIRST STEP Act gives non-violent offenders the chance to reenter society as productive, law-abiding citizens.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
138,TRUMP,Now states across the country are following our lead.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv

142,TRUMP,"Over the next two decades, he completed more than 30 Bible studies, became a law clerk, and mentored many of his fellow inmates.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv

156,TRUMP,This is a moral issue.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
157,TRUMP,"The lawless state of our southern border is a threat to the safety, security, and financial wellbeing of all America.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
158,TRUMP,We have a moral duty to create an immigration system that protects the lives and jobs of our citizens.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv

198,TRUMP,— thank you.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv

209,TRUMP,My administration has sent to Congress a commonsense proposal to end the crisis on the southern border.,0,20190205_trump_state.tsv

210,TRUMP,"It includes humanitarian assistance, more law enforcement, drug detection at our ports, closing loopholes that enable child smuggling, and plans for a new physical barrier, or wall, to secure the vast areas between our ports of entry.",0,20190205_trump_state.tsv
